# Creator Starter Kit

**Welcome to CodexDominion!** ðŸ”¥

You're now part of the Caribbean's first digital economy â€” where your creativity finally earns the income it deserves.

This starter kit will help you:
1. Upload your first product
2. Share your link
3. Start earning today

---

## WHAT IS CODEXDOMINION?

**CodexDominion** is a digital marketplace where Caribbean creators sell their products directly to diaspora buyers worldwide.

**You keep 80% of every sale.** No upfront fees. No middlemen.

**Popular Products:**
- eBooks (Christian, homeschool, wedding planning)
- Coloring books (kids, adults, seasonal)
- Digital courses (business, faith, lifestyle)
- Printable planners and worksheets
- Design templates (Canva, Figma, etc.)

---

## QUICK START (3 STEPS)

### Step 1: Upload Your First Product

1. Go to **Dashboard** â†’ **Products** â†’ **Upload New**
2. Fill out the form:
   - **Title:** Clear and descriptive (e.g., "Caribbean Wedding Planning eBook")
   - **Description:** 200-500 words (what's included, who it's for, benefits)
   - **Price:** Competitive but fair ($5-$50 for most digital products)
   - **Category:** Choose the best fit
   - **File:** Upload your product (PDF, ZIP, MP4, etc.)
   - **Preview Image:** Eye-catching thumbnail (1200x800px recommended)

3. Click **Save as Draft** (to review) or **Publish** (to go live immediately)

**Pro Tip:** Start with your best product first. Quality > quantity.

---

### Step 2: Share Your Link

Once your product is published, you'll get a **shareable link**:

```
https://codexdominion.app/products/your-product-id
```

**Where to Share:**
- âœ… Instagram (post + stories + link in bio)
- âœ… Facebook (groups, page, profile)
- âœ… TikTok (video + link in profile)
- âœ… Email (send to your list)
- âœ… WhatsApp (friends, family, groups)
- âœ… YouTube (video description)

**Copy & Paste Templates:**

**Instagram Post:**
```
ðŸ”¥ NEW PRODUCT LIVE! ðŸ”¥

âœ¨ What's inside: [brief description]
```

---

### Step 3: Track Your Earnings

**Dashboard â†’ Earnings:**
- See total revenue
- Track sales by product
- View earnings breakdown (80% to you, 20% to referrers if someone shared your link)

**When Do I Get Paid?**
- Earnings become available **7 days after purchase** (to allow for refunds)
- Request payout anytime (minimum $10)
- Choose your method: PayPal, bank transfer, Stripe, Venmo, or CashApp
- Payouts processed within **3-5 business days**

---

## PRODUCT UPLOAD CHECKLIST

Before publishing, make sure:

- [ ] **High-quality file** (no errors, properly formatted)
- [ ] **Clear title** (50 characters max, descriptive)
- [ ] **Detailed description** (200-500 words, explain value)
- [ ] **Competitive pricing** (research similar products)
- [ ] **Category selected** (helps buyers find your product)
- [ ] **Preview image** (1200x800px, eye-catching, professional)
- [ ] **Proofread everything** (no typos, broken links, or errors)

**File Requirements:**
- Max size: 100 MB
- Formats: PDF, ZIP, MP4, MP3, PNG, JPG, EPUB, MOBI
- For large files (courses, video bundles), use ZIP

---

## PRICING GUIDE

**How to Price Your Product:**

1. **Research competitors** (what do similar products cost?)
2. **Consider your effort** (how long did it take to create?)
3. **Think about value** (what results will buyers get?)

**Recommended Pricing:**
- **eBooks (20-50 pages):** $5-$15
- **eBooks (100+ pages):** $15-$30
- **Coloring books (20-30 pages):** $3-$8
- **Printable bundles:** $5-$12
- **Digital courses (video):** $25-$100
- **Design templates:** $10-$25

**Pro Tip:** Start slightly lower to build reviews, then raise prices as you gain traction.

---

## EARNINGS BREAKDOWN

**You earn 80% of every sale.**

**Example:**
- Product price: $20
- You earn: **$16** (80%)
- Platform fee: $4 (20%)

**If someone shares your link:**
- Product price: $20
- You earn: **$16** (80%)
- Youth referrer earns: **$4** (20% of your 80%)
- Platform keeps: $0 (we take nothing extra)

**Note:** Referrers only earn from products they share. Your direct sales = 100% yours.

---

## SHARING TIPS (HOW TO GET MORE SALES)

### 1. Create Hype
- Post teasers before launch ("Coming soon!")
- Build anticipation with behind-the-scenes content
- Announce launch day with excitement

### 2. Show Value
- Share sample pages or previews
- Explain what buyers will get
- Testimonials from beta testers (if you have them)

### 3. Make It Visual
- Use eye-catching graphics
- Create Instagram carousels
- Post video walkthroughs on TikTok/YouTube

### 4. Leverage Your Network
- Email your list first (warm audience)
- Share in relevant Facebook groups
- Ask friends/family to share

### 5. Repeat, Don't Spam
- Post multiple times (not everyone sees every post)
- Vary your messaging each time
- Use different platforms

---

## FAQ (FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS)

### How long does it take to get paid?
Earnings are available **7 days after purchase**. You can request a payout anytime (minimum $10). Payouts are processed within **3-5 business days**.

### What payment methods do you support?
PayPal, bank transfer (direct deposit), Stripe, Venmo, and CashApp.

### Can I update my product after publishing?
Yes! Go to **Dashboard â†’ Products â†’ Edit**. You can update the description, price, file, and image anytime.

### Can I offer discounts or promo codes?
Not yet, but we're working on it! For now, you can adjust your price manually for limited-time sales.

### What if a buyer requests a refund?
We have a **7-day refund policy**. If a buyer requests a refund, we review the case. Valid refunds are processed, and your earnings are adjusted. (Tip: Clear product descriptions reduce refund requests.)

### Can I sell physical products?
Currently, **digital products only** (eBooks, courses, printables, designs). Physical products coming soon!

### How do I get featured on the homepage?
We feature top-selling products and new releases. Keep uploading quality products, and promote your links â€” the more sales you make, the more visibility you get!

### Can I upload multiple products?
Absolutely! Upload as many products as you want. No limits.

### What if my file is larger than 100 MB?
Use a ZIP file to compress it, or host large files (video courses) on Google Drive / Dropbox and include the link in a PDF.

### Can I collaborate with other creators?
Yes! You can bundle products together or cross-promote each other's work. (Co-creator features coming soon.)

## EARNINGS CALCULATOR

Use this to estimate your earnings:

| Product Price | Your Earnings (80%) | After 10 Sales | After 50 Sales | After 100 Sales |
|---------------|---------------------|----------------|----------------|-----------------|
| $5 | $4 | $40 | $200 | $400 |
| $10 | $8 | $80 | $400 | $800 |
| $20 | $16 | $160 | $800 | $1,600 |
| $30 | $24 | $240 | $1,200 | $2,400 |
| $50 | $40 | $400 | $2,000 | $4,000 |

**Goal:** Make 100 sales at $20/each = **$1,600 in your pocket**. ðŸ”¥
